channel.title: A few questions about Bluurs Base
channel.description:
I'm using Bluurs base, and need to know a couple of things.
1) I've been looking all around for how to change max hits, but never can find it. I'm trying to boost my Rune Cbow's max hit, but DON'T SAY ITEM.JAVA, I've tried giving it 200m range bonus, and it's max stays the same, a 19.
2) How do I add specials? I'm in desperate need of a dbow spec, and I really need to know how to add them.
3) Well, my Barrows is REALLY messed up. When you tele there, they all start attacking you. What do I change to get them to not be agressive, and not auto attack someone?
Thank You for the help. Rep++ if you help me :)

item.title: A few questions about Bluurs Base
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

These problem’s have nothing to do with your client…

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions about Bluurs Base

item.title: A few questions about Bluurs Base
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:4, topic:295178”]1) The calculateRangeMaxHit() method or something of the sort.
2) There is a tutorial on this.
3) The NPCHandler class.[/quote]

  1. Just increase random stuff in there, till I eventually find my variable? lol, k
  2. I’ve been looking, but I can’t find the tut anywere. A link would be nice?
  3. What do I change in it?

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions about Bluurs Base

@jc22493 wrote:

  1. The calculateRangeMaxHit() method or something of the sort.
  2. There is a tutorial on this.
  3. The NPCHandler class.
